title: About TDR | Your Global Trade Partner
description: Maximize your profits by minimizing import duties and maximizing duty recovery with TDR.
bgImgCaption: A picture of Lagny-sur-Marne in France where TDR is headquartered
why-choose-description: At Trade Duty Refund, we pride ourselves on being the trusted partner for businesses navigating the complexities of global commerce. Here's why our clients choose us:
expertise-description: Our in-depth knowledge of customs regulations in the EU, UK, and US ensures seamless returns, saving businesses time and money.
comprehensive-description: From managing export documentation to handling inbound and outbound clearances, we offer end-to-end support tailored to your needs.
global-reach-description: Whether you’re a local business or a multinational corporation, our team delivers reliable, personalized service that scales with your operations.
protecting-margins-description: By minimizing import duties on returned goods, we help safeguard your profitability, even in a challenging cross-border sales landscape.
mission-paragraph1: At Trade Duty Refund, our mission is to simplify global trade for businesses by removing barriers and inefficiencies in duty management.
mission-paragraph2: We aim to empower businesses of all sizes to thrive in international markets by offering innovative, compliant, and cost-effective solutions for duty-free returns. We are committed to building long-term partnerships that add value to your operations, helping you stay competitive in an ever-evolving global economy.
what-we-do-description: Trade Duty Refund specializes in simplifying the process of duty-free returns for businesses engaged in international trade.
seamless-returns-description: We handle all aspects of returning goods duty-free, ensuring compliance with regulations in the EU, UK, and US.
customs-brokerage-description: Acting as your trusted customs broker, we manage export records, documentation, and claims with customs authorities.
duty-recovery-description: From reclaiming duties on returned items to facilitating duty drawback processes, we help businesses recover costs at every opportunity.
comprehensive-support-description: Whether you're an international eCommerce retailer, a third-party logistics provider, or an exporter, we offer solutions tailored to your unique challenges.
final-paragraph: At Trade Duty Refund, we make international returns simple, efficient, and cost-effective—so you can focus on growing your business.
